title: Is Riot gonna just let everyone use scripts?
body:
Everyone has easy access to free features of scripts and this is making the game so ugly.
Probably the reason why people are moving to dota2 and overwatch because riot is not doing anything about it.
Being able to use such scripts and not getting punished is just... so fucked. Do something and make some special request forms to report players and you guys need to investigate on those players. One of the thread in B.O.L says 'looking for a duo, masters, recently started using scripts.'  rofl... these high elo %%%%s are using scripts and not even punished. Who cares LoL is about to be gone anyways

replies.body:
Hey there,

While it might not seem like these people are being punished, believe me when I say, they are. Please continue to report any suspected cheaters in post-game as "Cheating" OR if you have any information on a suspected cheater do feel free to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and the information will be forwarded to the appropriate people.

Do remember that Player Support will be unable to give you any information on the outcome of your reports (if any).

Cheaters are banned in waves and at semi-random times, this is done to protect the integrity of Riots anti-cheat systems, if bans were handed out instantly for cheating then players and the developers of these cheats will know exactly when and what caused the detection and will be able to work around this.
